item.title: Is Interest in AI Waning?
item.description: Is the Novelty of Generative AI Wearing Off? ü§ñ‚è≥ AI generated pastiche of Le Penseur de Rodin In light of recent data analysis by Rand Fishkin and the team at Datos, questions around the staying power of generative AI‚Äîparticularly ChatGPT‚Äîare increasingly relevant. “We Analyzed Millions of ChatGPT User Sessions: Visits are Down 29% since May, Programming Assistance is 30% of Use” is the title that has us all talking. Is generative AI experiencing a downward trend, or are we witnessing a seasonal or situational ebb in usage?
